quality_assessment: Excellent comprehensive troubleshooting guide with minor drift issues. Documentation is thorough and accurate, covering all major use cases. Only minor issues with broken link and external environment variables.

broken_links.issue: Link target has anchor #output-formats but configuration.md does not have this section

issues.fix_suggestion: Update link from './configuration.md#output-formats' to './output-formats.md'. The Output Formats documentation is in a separate file.

issues.description: Documents PRODIGY_AUTOMATION and PRODIGY_VALIDATION as debtmap environment variables
issues.current_content: PRODIGY_AUTOMATION and PRODIGY_VALIDATION listed under 'Automation and CI/CD Variables'
issues.should_be: These are external environment variables used by Prodigy (the orchestration tool), not debtmap itself
issues.fix_suggestion: Either remove these variables from the debtmap documentation or clarify they are external to debtmap and used by the Prodigy orchestration tool. Add a note: 'Note: PRODIGY_* variables are used by the Prodigy orchestration tool, not debtmap itself.'

issues.description: Documents NO_EMOJI and NO_COLOR but these are handled via --plain flag
issues.current_content: Lists NO_EMOJI=1 and NO_COLOR=1 as environment variables under 'Output Customization'
issues.should_be: These environment variables may not be directly read by debtmap; the --plain flag achieves the same effect
issues.fix_suggestion: Clarify that --plain flag is the primary way to disable emoji/colors. If NO_EMOJI/NO_COLOR are supported, verify implementation; otherwise, note these are common terminal conventions but recommend using --plain flag.
